mapper.update:
update dev_ios_versions
update_time = now(), brand_name=#{version.brandName}, model_name=#{version.modelName}, ios_version=#{version.iosVersion}, ios_version_2=#{version.iosVersion2}, newth_ios_version=#{version.newthIosVersion}, state=#{version.state}, update_user=#{version.update_user},
where 1=1
AND id = #{version.id}
